alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:27AM EST until January 10 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek at Mount Marion. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flood stage. The Esopus Creek begins to spill over its banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 20.4 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Mount Marion Flood Stage: 20.0 Observed Stage at Wed 2 am: 18.1 Forecast: Wed 7 am 20.0 Wed 1 pm 20.4 Wed 7 pm 19.9 Thu 1 am 19.3 Thu 7 am 18.7 Thu 1 pm 18.3 Thu 7 pm 18.0 Fri 1 am 17.7 Fri 7 am 17.5 &&
